瀯瀯瀯

瀯字的基本解释

瀯
yíng
〔瀯瀯〕水流声，如“（水流）瀯瀯之声与耳谋。”

瀯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yíng］
［《集韻》維傾切，平清，以。］
水回旋貌。

瀯字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　瀯； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页660第28
【集韻】【韻會】?維傾切，音營。澴瀯，水迴旋貌。　又渟瀯，小水也。【杜篤·論都賦】去洛邑之渟瀯。亦作汀瀯。　又瀯瀯，水聲也。【白居易·冷泉亭記】瀯瀯之聲與耳謀。　【集韻】或作濴。亦作濚。

瀯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
瀯字的起名意思

暂无。

Wan
Basic explanation of words
Wan
yíng
〔瀯瀯〕The sound of water flow, such as "(Water flow) The sound of Huanghuang and earmou."
Wan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yíng］
["Ji Yun" dimension is cut, calm and clear, to. ]
Water swirling appearance.
Wan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Character Department] 　瀯; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 660 28
[Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Wei Qingqie, Yinying. Wandering, water swirling appearance.　Yuan Zhen again, Xiao Shui also. 【Du Du·Lundu Fu】Go to Luoyi Zhiluo. Also known as Tingzhu.　 瀯瀯 again, and the sound of water. 【Bai Juyi·Lengquan Pavilion】The Voice of Huanghuang and Earmou.　【Jiyun】or Zuozhu. Also for Yi.
Wan
